document.full_text: vancouver canucks goalie roberto luongo was expecting a titanic duel against boston bruins netminder tim thomas from the drop of the opening puck in the stanley cup finals on wednesday.
document.title: luongo draws first blood in stanley cup goalie battle
lines_and_colors: vancouver canucks goalie roberto luongo was expecting a titanic duel against boston bruins netminder tim thomas from the drop of the opening puck in the stanley cup finals on wednesday.
